newsitem.title: USA: Engineering Animation to develop 3-D med. images.
newsitem.headline: Engineering Animation to develop 3-D med. images.

text.p: Engineering Animation Inc on Monday said it was developing three-dimensional software to assist in the treatment of unruptured abdominal aortic aneurysms.
The software will be used by EndoVascular Technologies Inc as part of its new Endovascular Grafting System, Engineering Animation said.
The system is a less invasive, less expensive alternative to open vascular surgery. It should result in fewer deaths and faster patient recoveries, the company said.
Engineering Animation develops 3-D visualization technology for a wide range of industries. Its stock was up 1-1/8 at 24-1/4.
